DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate which combination therapy is more effective for improving the blood pressure (BP) and AM central SBP in hypertensive patients:Angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) plus calcium channel blocker (CCB) or ARB plus diuretics
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Effects Between Amlodipine and Hydrochlorothiazide in Combination With Losartan on 24-hr Central Blood Pressure in Hypertensive Patients
DOC.criteria: Hypertension patients not included exclusion criteria Mean seated SBP ≥140mmHg in patients with newly Diagnosed msDBP≥110mmHg or ms SBP ≥ 180mmHg at the screening and randomization visit
